event.title: was created out of Whitman County on November 24, 1883

data.event: The county was created out of Whitman County on November 24, 1883 and is named for Abraham Lincoln, 16th President of the United States.
In 2004 it voted for Republican George W. Bush over John Kerry 69%-30%.
In 2008 it voted for John McCain over Barack Obama 62%-35%.
In the 2008 election Republicans carried the county in all races where party affiliation was listed.
